title: clone.fyi website
descriptionMd: Designed and engineered the website and backend CMS for a new brand and curated link aggregation site from [dirt.fyi](dirt.fyi) and Boys Club. The CMS featured support for pulling in  dynamic RSS feeds and a flow for syndicating those to the site with manual approval. The website features a visitor count and an interactive sheep cursor that also “clones” new sheep that hang out and jump around at the bottom of the page on the footer.
